an4.103:1.3: Tuccho pihito, pūro vivaṭo, tuccho vivaṭo, pūro pihito—
an4.103:1.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kumbhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.103:1.7: Tuccho pihito, pūro vivaṭo, tuccho vivaṭo, pūro pihito.
an4.103:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito?
an4.103:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:2.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.103:2.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti pihito.
an4.103:2.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho pihito;
an4.103:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti vivaṭo?
an4.103:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:3.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.103:3.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti vivaṭo.
an4.103:3.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho pūro vivaṭo;
an4.103:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivaṭo?
an4.103:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:4.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.103:4.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tuccho hoti vivaṭo.
an4.103:4.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho tuccho vivaṭo;
an4.103:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti pihito?
an4.103:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.103:5.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.103:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pūro hoti pihito.
an4.103:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, kumbho pūro pihito;
an4.103:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kumbhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
